d_0.desc: initial value of foreign debt (negative of NFA)
d_0.note: initial value of net foreign debt in year 0

c_0.desc: NCP in % of GDP in year 0
c_0.note: initial value of NCP in % of GDP in year 0

inv_0.desc: Investment in % of GDP in year 0
inv_0.note: private gross fixed CF as % of GDP in year 0

gov_inv_0.desc: public investment in % of GDP in year 0
gov_inv_0.note: gov gross fixed CF as % of GDP in year 0

ynon_0.desc: non-oil GDP in % of GDP in year 0
ynon_0.note: non-oil GDP in % of GDP in year 0

yoil_0.desc: oil production in % of GDP in year 0
yoil_0.note: oil production in % of GDP in year 0

ca_0.desc: current account in % of GDP in year 0
ca_0.note: current account in % of GDP in year 0

k_0.desc: private capital to GDP ratio in year 0
k_0.note: valued at 0.561 from Gupta et al. (2012), accumulated private fixed CF plus change in inventories

s_0.desc: public capital in to GDP ratio in year 0
s_0.note: valued at 0.828 from Gupta et al. (2012), accumulated public investment

gov_exp_0.desc: gov total expenditure in % of GDP
gov_exp_0.note: total public expediture as % of GDP in year 0
